content:
#!/bin/sh
# formval.cgi
# franklin@uci.edu update of http://hoohoo.ncsa.uiuc.edu/cgi/test-cgi.txt
# echoes STDIN

echo Content-type: text/plain
echo

echo CGI/1.1 test script report:

echo
echo "---- Start of STDIN ----"
while read x
do
  echo $x
done
echo $x
unset x
echo "---- End of STDIN ----"

echo
echo argc=$#. argv="$*".
echo "--- Start of full output from 'set' ---"
set
echo "---- End of full output from 'set' ----"
